name: Reel Fishing Pocket
description:
-----------------------
Thanks to everyone for helping make
Reel Fishing Pocket a big success for us!
-----------------------

Natsume's award-winning, best-selling fishing title is now available on the AppStore!

Reel Fishing Pocket features realistic graphics, soothing environmental sounds, and epic fish battles that make you feel you’re really on the banks of fish-filled rivers, streams, and lakes!

Easy-to-use controls make it fun for any angler in the family.
Don’t let this one get away!


Features:

Realistic graphics!

Soothing environmental sounds!

Epic battles with gigantic fish!

Over 30 challenging missions!

Tons of fishing tackles!
